attributes.action: stop other eu LGV drivers, driving for british companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Britain we hold a very high standard of driving. Other eu members do not hold the same standards as we do. They are allowed to pass a LGV test at a fraction of the cost and to a very very low standard to the UK LGV test, then are allowed to come here and drive on our roads. This is cleary not acceptable. 
In France they do not allow this. You have to pass a test and hold the appropriate licence.
We need to address this as too many accidents involving people from other eu states. 
We as a country do not want to be part of europe.
